Service Details: - Collects good quality, used clothing, household and furniture items - Offers pick-up service for bags and/or boxes from Sicamous through to Osoyoos- Drop-offs can be made in Kelowna at:  Value Village, Walmart (bin), Kirschner Rd Recycling Depot (bin), Glenmore Landfill (trailer) - Drop-offs can be made in West Kelowna at:  Walmart (bin), West Kelowna Landfill (trailer) - Does NOT take furniture and other large items, TV's or computer products
